### Driver and Barrier Analysis for Industrial Energy Efficiency Adoption

**Tender Announcement ID:** cb-890-75836044
**Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000083940
**Publication Date:** November 20, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** December 16, 2024, 14:00 (local time)

**Background:**
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking a contractor to support the Office of Energy Efficiency (OEE) in conducting a comprehensive investigation into the drivers and barriers affecting energy efficiency adoption within Canada's industrial sectors. The selected contractor will analyze energy efficiency trends, conduct stakeholder interviews, and provide insights into potential areas for federal action.

**Objectives:**

* Conduct a literature review on energy efficiency trends and drivers/barriers within Canadian industrial sectors.
* Conduct structured interviews with stakeholders to gather sector-specific insights.
* Deliver a comprehensive report and presentation outlining key findings, sector-specific recommendations, and strategic insights to inform NRCan's approach in promoting energy efficiency adoption.

**Key Requirements:**

* The contractor will work primarily from their own premises, maintaining regular communication with NRCan through virtual meetings and bi-weekly progress updates.
* Deliverables are due by March 31, 2025.
* Security requirements are associated with this contract. Refer to Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**
The bid solicitation allows bidders to use the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to transmit their bids electronically. Bidders must refer to Part 2 - Bidder Instructions, and Part 3 - Bid Preparation Instructions, of the bid solicitation for further information.

**Selection Criteria:**
The contractor will be selected based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Attachements:**
The bid solicitation documents, including the request for proposal (RFP) and annexures, can be accessed on the Canada Can Buy website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Contact information for Alexande Rheault at NRCan is included for any questions or further information.
